description: Sometimes we can all use an encouraging word, and these selected verses will hopefully be a source of encouragement for such times. A random verse will be selected and given to the listener.
exampleInteractions: Alexa, ask Daily Bread to give me a Bible verse
Alexa ask Daily Bread to tell me a Bible scripture
Alexa ask Daily Bread to give me a scripture
name: DailyBread
shortDescription: A variety of uplifting Bible verses
